title: About a week ago I went up by 30-ish ping.
body:
Went from 30-ish to 60-ish ms ping (not a big deal since I played at around 100 from the east coast before the servers were relocated), but I did notice a slight impact on gameplay since I've been used to lower ping for a while now.

And then people were getting random lag spikes (I was just at a constant 60-62) and junk, and now people aren't able to log in...

So you guys think my random ping jump had something to do with the server issues building up to a breaking point?

"It's your internet, nerd."

Except it isn't, because multiple people I know also experienced a jump in their latency.
